idioms.word: 碁に凝ると親の死に目に逢わぬ
idioms.reading: ごにこるとおやのしにめにあわぬ
idioms.meaning: if you get too absorbed when playing go, you will miss your parent's deathbed

lessons.japanese: 彼女は肩が凝る本を読む気にはなれなかった。
lessons.english: She was not in the mood for serious books.

lessons.japanese: 彼は何かをやり出すとそれに凝る性質です。
lessons.english: When he begins to do anything, he devotes himself to it.

lessons.japanese: 彼の聞く音楽といったら肩の凝るものばかりだ。
lessons.english: He always listens to serious music.
